project.name: Micro-SaaS Space
project.description: A universal AI-driven platform empowering non-technical founders to build, launch, and automate their micro-SaaS products effortlessly.

core_agents.name: Market Research & Validation
core_agents.role: Analyze trending SaaS ideas and validate them through community data (Reddit, Indie Hackers, Product Hunt, Twitter).
tasks: Fetch and summarize trending micro-SaaS discussions from key startup platforms.
Score and validate ideas using engagement metrics and pain-point frequency.
Generate concise reports with actionable validation summaries.
Store validated ideas in the Supabase 'ideas' table for founder access.

core_agents.name: Idea Refinement & Positioning
core_agents.role: Convert raw SaaS ideas into refined, investor-ready concepts with unique positioning.
tasks: Rewrite validated ideas into clear SaaS product pitches.
Define the problem statement, solution, target audience, and USP.
Generate product names, taglines, and brand storylines automatically.
Store refined outputs to Supabase and tag them by category.

core_agents.name: Landing Page & Copywriter
core_agents.role: Generate launch-ready landing pages for each validated idea.
tasks: Generate SEO-optimized landing page content and hero copy.
Produce UI structure in React (Next.js) with Tailwind styling.
Integrate newsletter and signup components using Supabase Auth.
Publish generated pages to Replit-hosted preview links.

core_agents.name: Backend Automation (n8n / Replit Tasks)
core_agents.role: Automate the marketing and operational pipelines for each SaaS product.
tasks: Build n8n workflows for social media posting, newsletter scheduling, and analytics tracking.
Monitor campaign metrics via Google Analytics API and update performance dashboards.
Trigger auto-iterations of idea generation based on trend shifts.

core_agents.name: Marketing & Community Growth
core_agents.role: Help founders grow their SaaS user base using automated outreach and content workflows.
tasks: Generate weekly marketing ideas and content calendars.
Auto-create social media posts, blog outlines, and newsletters.
Analyze growth metrics and recommend improvements for each SaaS project.

core_agents.name: Self-Improvement & Iteration Engine
core_agents.role: Continuously refine SaaS ideas and workflows based on analytics and feedback.
tasks: Analyze product analytics, CTR, and user engagement metrics.
Iterate on copy, design, and automation workflows using AI feedback.
Auto-update Supabase database and notify founders about improvements.

automation_workflows.description: Runs every 24h to fetch new SaaS ideas and validate trends.
Every week, generate landing pages and marketing assets for top 3 ideas.
Monitor metrics and optimize outputs across all agents.
